channel.title: Jobs matching “ruby” within 20 miles of 80010 - Stack Overflow Careers

item.title: Senior Back-end ROR (Ruby on Rails) developer at EchoStar (Superior, CO)
item.description:
Summary:


Dishanywhere com, a wholly owned subsidiary of EchoStar, in Superior, CO, is looking for a Senior Back-end ROR (Ruby on Rails) developer to be part of a talented team working on our Backbone.js/Ruby on Rails web application.


Responsibilities:



  • Working with the product owner, and the UI developer to define, design and implement new backend services for backend and mobile client for dishanywhere.com. 

  • Enhance existing features and perform tuning of code.

  • Design, implement and write unit tests for new backend services on dishanywhere.com. 

  • The backend end restful services will be implemented using Ruby and elastic search.

item.title: Ruby on Rails Web Developer - Contract Position at By the Pixel (Denver, CO) (allows remote)
item.description:
Do you love building medium to large scale Ruby on Rails applications?


We are By the Pixel, a small and mighty digital agency located in Lakewood, Colorado. We are looking to hire a full-time contract Rails developer to join our team of passionate and driven individuals. Our company specializes in custom web application design and development. 


Some of your responsibilities will include:



  • Database architecture and creation

  • Implementing new management and end user features

  • Creating customer and admin portals


Architectures and technologies used:



  • Ruby on Rails

  • Knockout.js

  • RESTful API

  • AJAX

  • Git revision control (via GitHub)


Position details:



  • Contract will be for three months but is negotiable depending on level of hourly commitment per week.

  • Possibility for additional contract or full-time work to follow.
